thread.title: Tupelo: Digital building applications will speed up permits
thread.title_full: Tupelo: Digital building applications will speed up permits - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Tupelo: Digital building applications will speed up permits
text:
TUPELO, Miss. (AP) - Tupelo officials hope that digital applications will let them cut in half the time needed to decide whether to approve commercial building permits.
Development director Shane Hooper tells The Northeast Mississippi Daily Journal ( http://bit.ly/1RPZpKV ) that another benefit of online submissions would be knowing precisely when applications are turned in.
He says he and other department staffers got some ideas from an August trip to Huntsville, Alabama.
The department is already encouraging contractors to submit digital versions of their drawings, rather than printing them out.
Hooper says the department plans to ask the city for money in the next budget cycle.
He says he hopes to cut the application process from 48 days to 21 days.
Information from: Northeast Mississippi Daily Journal, http://djournal.com
